description: Voice Notes Wrapper - Recording Shortcuts Configuration

notes.primary_shortcuts: F10/F11/F12 are the main shortcuts - always active
notes.record: Key to start recording (configurable for Bluetooth remotes)
notes.pause: Key to pause active recording (configurable for Bluetooth remotes)
notes.stop: Key to stop recording (configurable for Bluetooth remotes)
notes.bluetooth_example: For Bluetooth remote, map the 'shortcuts' section to the remote's button codes
notes.custom_keys: You can use any single key (A-Z, 0-9) or key combinations like 'CommandOrControl+R'
notes.warning: Avoid single keys like 'r', 's', 'p' as they interfere with web page typing
